name: Blackchalk IT Services
tagline: you name it, we code it
description:
BlackChalk, was started by enthusiastic team who envisioned the future of IT business. BlackChalk was started as web advertisement company in 2009. In parallel to which the company was also providing the service of developing and maintaining website for their client.
 
We have understood development in IT services and other technology like mobile platform. Understanding the needs we started developing application since 2011 for both the platforms viz web and mobile. We also customise according to the needs of our customer.
 
When the end consumer living and communication pattern changed, we thought of making their data available anywhere at anytime. That’s when we developed application on a cloud platform.
 
With this thought, Prezons, our cloud application for school management was developed making it first of its kind in India. We have successfully achieved in simplifying the process of school management. We have reputed schools as our client. We have also developed mobile application in both android and iOS platforms.
 
Now, with the success in education sector we plan to foray into Consumer durable particularly retail segment where we see a huge change in trend in POS and consumer needs. That’s where we, BlackChalk would provide the required and customised IT service which would help retailers to manage internal and consumer need without hassle.
